channel.title: CVE Feed for Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) -- UPV PEIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) -- UPV PEIX

item.title: CVE-2023-2544|2023-10-03T13:03:13.218Z -- universitat%20polit%C3%A8cnica%20de%20val%C3%A8ncia%20%28upv%29 -- upv%20peix
item.description: Authorization bypass vulnerability in UPV PEIX, affecting the component "pdf_curri_new.php". Through a POST request, an authenticated user could change the ID parameter to retrieve all the stored information of other registered users.
